questiontext.text: When testing the null hypothesis μ = 6 with a two-sided risk of 5% the value of the test quantity (tgh) and the conclusion will be apply:

answer.text: Value of tgh falls in critical area, reject H0.

feedback.text: TRUE value of tgh falls into critical area, reject H0…: Correct

answer.text: TRUE value of tgh falls into critical area, do not reject H0.

feedback.text: TRUE Value of tgh falls into critical area, reject H0 not…: Incorrect

answer.text: TRUE of tgh does not fall into critical area, reject H0.

feedback.text: TRUE Value of tgh does not fall into critical area, reject H0…: Incorrect

answer.text: TRUE of tgh does not fall into critical area, do not reject H0.

feedback.text: TRUE of tgh does not fall into critical area, do not reject H0…: Incorrect
